DOC.detailed_description: Red raspberry excellent source numerous polyphenolic antioxidant . The bioactivity compound implicated many biological pathway may function reduce risk numerous chronic disease . We conduct intervention study frozen red raspberry healthy adult population order determine raspberry polyphenols bioavailable bioactive vivo . Twenty-four subject ( 12 male 12 female ) recruit participate consume one-cup frozen red raspberry daily two week , randomly assign consume either one , two four cup raspberries another two week , follow four week non-treatment . Blood sample 12-hour urine collection take order measure concentration raspberry polyphenols response treatment dose . Dose-dependent treatment effect blood biomarkers antioxidant capacity , oxidative stress , inflammation chronic disease risk factor also measure .
DOC.criteria: healthy adult obese ( > 30kg/m2 ) high blood pressure ( 140/90mmHg ) allergic raspberry pregnant lactate history chronic disease currently take medication
